decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: 2204_115FR_002 REV A: Site Plan; 2204_115FR_100 REV A: PROPOSED GENERAL ARRANGEMENT PLAN GROUND FLOOR; 2204_115FR_101 REV A: PROPOSED GENERAL ARRANGEMENT PLAN FIRST FLOOR; 2204_115FR_102 REV A: PROPOSED GENERAL ARRANGEMENT PLAN SECOND FLOOR: 2204_115FR_112 REV A: PROPOSED GENERAL ARRANGEMENT ELEVATIONS - REAR; 2204_115FR_116 REV A: PROPOSED GENERAL ARRANGEMENT SECTION B-B; 2204_115FR_001: Location Plan; 2204_115FR_021: EXISTING GENERAL ARRANGEMENT PLAN -, FIRST FLOOR; 2204_115FR_022: EXISTING GENERAL ARRANGEMENT PLAN -SECOND FLOOR; 2204_115FR_023: EXISTING GENERAL ARRANGEMENT PLAN -ROOF PLAN; 2204_115FR_026: EXISTING GENERAL ARRANGEMENT ELEVATIONS - FRONT; 2204_115FR_027: EXISTING GENERAL ARRANGEMENT ELEVATIONS - REAR; 2204_115FR_031: EXISTING GENERAL ARRANGEMENT SECTION A-A; 2204_115FR_103: PROPOSED GENERAL ARRANGEMENT PLAN ROOF PLAN; 2204_115FR_020: EXISTING GENERAL ARRANGEMENT PLAN - GROUND FLOOR
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012).
description: Single storey rear extension; rear roof extension; installation of two roof lights to front roofslope (Following demolition of existing conservatory)
